div.p: ( a) the mean of dXCO 2 from the annual dXCO 2 during 2010 to 2015 overlaid with CARMA power plants locations; ( b) the correlation between emission of CARMA power plants within 1° × 1°grid which are binned by every 0.3 t/yr of lgE and the corresponding mean dXCO 2, different color dots represent different segment of CARMA power plants emissions.
